customers_say: Customers find the smart lock to be well-built and secure, with one mentioning that fingerprint data is stored locally. The device is practical and easy to set up, working well with multi-point lock door systems. They appreciate its convenience, with one customer noting it's perfect for gym bags or lockers, and another highlighting its quick biometric scanner.

top_reviews.review_comment: Reliable, Stylish & Easy to Use ‚Äì A Must-Have Upgrade for Any Home! I absolutely love this Blusafe Fingerprint Door Lock! It has completely upgraded the security and convenience of my storage door. The installation was a breeze‚Äîeven for someone like me who‚Äôs not very handy. The instructions were clear, and I had it set up and working in under 30 minutes. Major bonus points for being DIY-friendly, especially for women or anyone new to smart home tech. The fingerprint reader is incredibly fast and accurate, unlocking the door every time. I also appreciate the versatility‚Äîbesides fingerprints, it has a responsive keypad, a physical key option (comes with 2 keys).The auto-lock feature gives me peace of mind, knowing the door always locks behind me. The sleek, modern design with a solid handle and built-in deadbolt adds a stylish touch to the door, and it feels very durable and secure

top_reviews.review_title: Might not work with Anderson Locks. Verify first
top_reviews.review_comment: The description says that it works with 90% of lift handle locks. I have asked if it will work specifically with the Anderson lift handle and they have not been able to tell me. The handle comes with a sticker that says if opened this is considered used. I have asked for permission to open to see if compatible with my door and have not had a reply and fear if I investigate I won't be able to return.
